title: 820-2936 Only runs off charged battery but wont detect the charger
message: Im new at this, 2936 works fine off charged batt but wont detect the charger, no green light no nothing. I have already tried different DC ports

title: 820-2936 Only runs off charged battery but wont detect the charger
message: When you plug in the battery, does it detect the charger at all? Post resistance between pins 17/18 and 27/28 of the ISL6259.

title: 820-2936 Only runs off charged battery but wont detect the charger
message:
Remove battery and post 3V42_G3H and PPBUS_G3H exact voltage.

Also post exact value for R7080/81 and R7085/86 measured onboard, ohm scale.
